title: Fighter
content:
otion x2, Scroll of Revivify

UNIQUE CLASS FEATURE

Fighting Style: Archery: You gain a +2 bonus to Ranged Weapon attack rolls. Defence: You gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wearing Armour. Duelling: When you are wielding a melee weapon that is not Two-Handed or Versatile in one hand, and no weapon in the other hand, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon, increasing your chance to do heavy damage.
